channel.title: Castle Wars help
channel.description:
hey guys, in castle wars on my server you can steal from the tables, but! In one of the tables, once in a while gives a perfect ring, but i don't know how to fix it, so i found the code :cool:
case 4462: TheifStall("table", "and recieve an item", 85, 105*playerLevel[17], Item.randomarmour(), 1, 30, 0x340); break;
So what do all of those mean? can someone please explain to me? Or just how would it be if i still wanted to be like that, but so perfect ring wouldn't appear? Owner of MinimiScape MinimiGuard

item.title: Castle Wars help
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

That’s ok, I love the fact that you are using it at all. It will help prevent spam in the long run.

And thanks for helping somebody out phonecheck, we need more members like you around here. You will get CM in no time if you keep helping people.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars help
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“Minimi Guard, post:1, topic:42833”]hey guys, in castle wars on my server you can steal from the tables, but! In one of the tables, once in a while gives a perfect ring, but i don’t know how to fix it, so i found the code

[quote]case 4462:
TheifStall(“table”, “and recieve an item”, 85, 105*playerLevel[17], Item.randomarmour(), 1, 30, 0x340);
break;[/quote]

So what do all of those mean? can someone please explain to me? Or just how would it be if i still wanted to be like that, but so perfect ring wouldn’t appear?

        Owner of MinimiScape
                         MinimiGuard[/quote]

Just to let ya know,this is very easy to do,Open your item.java and search for

public static int randarmour[]

Youll see a whole bunch of numbers right after this.Find the number 773 in those numbers and delete it.

Read full topic
